TopicTitle: Ability to set near craft as target in flight mode (not only in map view)

Articles.Content: In original ksp1  I could set near craft or its docking port as target by just clicking on craft or its part. But in ksp2 is no this ability now, and I must to switch to map view to set craft as target. It is so uncomfortable: in map view close craft marks often overlap each other, also when center of mass of target craft doesn't match docking port I must dock to this by eye

There is, I just did that. Just need to pick the docking port of the target craft. Not sure if you also need to go "control from here" from your docking port.
